name: Bartok - Amazing Places
description:
Classic card game Bartok. Play to unlock images. There are 100 levels to unlock.

If you like this game, get the PC version here: (it's free)

https://peter-apoguy.itch.io/bartok-free

If you would like to make your own levels, get this game with a level editor:

https://peter-apoguy.itch.io/bartok
